meanings.definition: The presence of excessive amounts of nitrogenous compounds in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with azotemias after analyzing the blood test results.
meanings.sent2: Azotemias can be a serious health concern if not treated promptly.
